body_html: WTF
title: I've just discovered that my upvotes are downvotes and vice versa...  anyone else?

body: Upon further inspection, it looks as though my upvotes have no effect, but my downvotes are counted as upvotes.  WTF, dudes?
body_html: Upon further inspection, it looks as though my upvotes have no effect, but my downvotes are counted as upvotes. WTF, dudes?

post.title: I've just discovered that my upvotes are downvotes and vice versa...  anyone else?

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: That's normal. For some reason Ruqqus stores a static value for scores which is updated periodically, so your votes won't count until the next time it updates.
body_html: That's normal. For some reason Ruqqus stores a static value for scores which is updated periodically, so your votes won't count until the next time it updates.
